TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract Geometry extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable implements class System.IFormattable
Public MustInherit Class Geometry Inherits Animatable Implements IFormattable
public ref class Geometry abstract : System::Windows::Media::Animation::Animatable, IFormattable

summary.span: 派生自此抽象基类的类可定义几何形状。

span.span: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define geometric shapes.

summary.span: 对象可用于剪辑、命中测试以及呈现二维图形数据。

span.span: objects can be used for clipping, hit-testing, and rendering 2-D graphic data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相比形状的几何图形Geometry Compared to Shape 类具有， ，和其他呈现属性，它派生的类没有。The class has a , , and other rendering properties that and its derived classes lack. 类是，并因此参与布局系统，则为它的派生的类可以用作任何支持的元素的内容子级。The class is a and therefore participates in the layout system; its derived classes can be used as the content of any element that supports children. 类，另一方面，只需定义形状的几何图形，并且无法呈现自身。The class, on the other hand, simply defines the geometry of a shape, and cannot render itself. 由于其简易性，而它具有广泛的使用。Because of its simplicity, it has a wider range of uses. **可冻结功能：** 从继承，因此类，类提供了一些特殊功能：可以声明对象，为在多个对象，进行只读的以提高之间共享性能，克隆，并进行线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

para.span: 尽管此类为抽象类，它不是公开可扩展。

span.span: Although this class is abstract, it is not publicly extensible.

value.span: 的与坐标轴对齐的边界框。

span.span: The axis-aligned bounding box of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不会考虑可能由笔画添加区域。This property does not take into account the area potentially added by a stroke.

summary.span: 创建 的一个可修改复本，从而制作该对象的值的深层副本。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of the , making deep copies of the object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 创建 对象的一个可修改复本，从而制作该对象的当前值的深层副本。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of the object, making deep copies of the object's current values.

summary.span: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

public: static System::Windows::Media::PathGeometry ^ Combine(System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ geometry1, System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ geometry2, System::Windows::Media::GeometryCombineMode mode, System::Windows::Media::Transform ^ transform);

param.name: geometry1
param.span: 要合并的第一个几何图形。

span.span: The first geometry to combine.

param.name: geometry2
param.span: 要合并的第二个几何图形。

span.span: The second geometry to combine.

param.name: mode
param.span: 枚举值之一，指定几何图形的合并方式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies how the geometries are combined.

param.name: transform
param.span: 要向合并后的几何图形应用的转换或 。

span.span: A transformation to apply to the combined geometry, or .

summary.span: 使用指定的 合并两个几何图形，并对生成的几何图形应用指定的转换。

span.span: Combines the two geometries using the specified and applies the specified transform to the resulting geometry.

returns.span: 合并后的几何图形。

span.span: The combined geometry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用默认的公差因子 (所描述属性) 时合并几何图形。This method uses the default tolerance factor (described by the property) when combining geometries. 若要指定自己的公差因子，使用方法。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the method. 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用多边形近似的几何图形。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差因素指定此多边形的近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的容差值生成更好的近似值，但需要更多处理与某一大容差系数的近似相比。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用时，应涉及认真考虑执行联合，因为它会占用大量的 CPU。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大多数情况下，或将更好地工作。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用仅当时任何适用以下原则：Use only when any of the following apply: - 几何操作不是联合。The geometric operation is not a union. - 几何图形的任一具有值自交，几何图形并且 (即实际很重要)。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 时间并不是问题，但空间 （例如，如果该几何图形是创建一次，然后缓存）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常情况下，生成的输出小于。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 将描边所生成的几何图形，或将其用于路径动画和不提供所需的轮廓。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry Combine (System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry1, System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry2, System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode mode, System.Windows.Media.Transform transform, double tolerance, System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType type);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry Combine(class System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry1, class System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry2, valuetype System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode mode, class System.Windows.Media.Transform transform, float64 tolerance, valuetype System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType type) cil managed

param.name: geometry1
param.span: 要合并的第一个几何图形。

span.span: The first geometry to combine.

param.span: 要合并的第二个几何图形。

param.name: mode
param.span: 枚举值之一，指定几何图形的合并方式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies how the geometries are combined.

param.name: transform
param.span: 要向合并后的几何图形应用的转换或 。

span.span: A transformation to apply to the combined geometry, or .

param.name: tolerance
param.span: 几何图形的多边形近似中两点间距离的上限。

span.span: The maximum bounds on the distance between points in the polygonal approximation of the geometries.

param.span: 值越小，生成的结果就越准确，但执行速度会变慢。

span.span: Smaller values produce more accurate results but cause slower execution.

param.span: 如果 tolerance 小于 .000001，则改用 .000001。

span.span: If tolerance is less than .000001, .000001 is used instead.

param.name: type
param.span: 值之一，指定公差因子是绝对值还是相对于几何图形区域的相对值。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether the tolerance factor is an absolute value or relative to the area of the geometry.

summary.span: 使用指定的 和公差因子合并两个几何图形，并对生成的几何图形应用指定的转换。

span.span: Combines the two geometries using the specified and tolerance factor, and applies the specified transform to the resulting geometry.

returns.span: 合并后的几何图形。

span.span: The combined geometry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用多边形近似的几何图形。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差因素指定此多边形的近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的容差值生成更好的近似值，但需要更多处理与某一大容差系数的近似相比。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用时，应涉及认真考虑执行联合，因为它会占用大量的 CPU。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大多数情况下，或将更好地工作。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用仅当时任何适用以下原则：Use only when any of the following apply: - 几何操作不是联合。The geometric operation is not a union. - 几何图形的任一具有值自交，几何图形并且 (即实际很重要)。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 时间并不是问题，但空间 （例如，如果该几何图形是创建一次，然后缓存）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常情况下，生成的输出小于。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 将描边所生成的几何图形，或将其用于路径动画和不提供所需的轮廓。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用多边形近似的几何图形。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差因素指定此多边形的近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的容差值生成更好的近似值，但需要更多处理与某一大容差系数的近似相比。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用多边形近似的几何图形。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差因素指定此多边形的近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的容差值生成更好的近似值，但需要更多处理与某一大容差系数的近似相比。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

span.span: Gets a that is a polygonal approximation of the object.

span.span: Returns a value that describes the intersection between the specified and the stroke created by applying the specified to the current geometry.

returns.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的公差因子 (由定义属性) 确定指定的几何图形是否位于当前几何图形笔画时使用。The default tolerance factor (defined by the property) is used when determining whether the specified geometry is located in the current geometry's stroke. 若要指定自己的公差因子，使用方法。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the method. 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用多边形近似的几何图形。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差因素指定此多边形的近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的容差值生成更好的近似值，但需要更多处理与某一大容差系数的近似相比。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail StrokeContainsWithDetail (System.Windows.Media.Pen pen, System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry, double tolerance, System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType type);

.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail StrokeContainsWithDetail(class System.Windows.Media.Pen pen, class System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry, float64 tolerance, valuetype System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType type) cil managed

public: System::Windows::Media::IntersectionDetail StrokeContainsWithDetail(System::Windows::Media::Pen ^ pen, System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ geometry, double tolerance, System::Windows::Media::ToleranceType type);

param.name: pen
param.span: 一个确定当前几何图形的笔画区域的对象。

param.name: tolerance
param.span: 几何图形的多边形近似中两点间距离的上限。

span.span: The maximum bounds on the distance between points in the polygonal approximation of the geometries.

param.span: 值越小，生成的结果就越准确，但执行速度会变慢。

span.span: Smaller values produce more accurate results but cause slower execution.

param.span: 如果 tolerance 小于 .000001，则改用 .000001。

span.span: If tolerance is less than .000001, .000001 is used instead.

param.name: type
param.span: 值之一，指定公差因子是绝对值还是相对于几何图形区域的相对值。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether the tolerance factor is an absolute value or relative to the area of the geometry.

summary.span: 在给出指定的误差范围的情况下，获取一个值，该值描述指定的 与通过向当前几何图形应用指定 所创建的笔画的交集。

span.span: Gets a value that describes the intersection between the specified and the stroke created by applying the specified to the current geometry, given the specified margin of error.

returns.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用多边形近似的几何图形。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差因素指定此多边形的近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的容差值生成更好的近似值，但需要更多处理与某一大容差系数的近似相比。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前对象不具有任何转换值，则此方法返回标识转换。This method returns the identity transformation if the current object has no transformation value. 否则，它将返回应用于当前对象。Otherwise, it returns the applied to the current object. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性，将应用到对象。The following example shows how to use the property to apply a to a object. 该示例使用来从三个创建的复合形状对象，然后将几何图形 45 度旋转使用属性。The example uses a to create a composite shape from three objects and then rotates the geometry 45 degrees by using the property.
